text:
Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel follows Danvers, an Air Force officer, as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes after earth gets involved in a galactic war between alien. The movie also stars Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Brie Larson, and Jude Law.
Captain Marvel opens in theaters on March 8, 2019. Here are some of the first reactions from critics who saw the film at an early preview screening:
"Captain Marvel is an electrifying blast of sci-fi action and adventure. It’s a movie that never stops moving, with plenty of twists and turns to keep you guessing until the very end. And yes, it has lots of great moments for Carol Danvers – aka Captain Marvel – played by the amazing @brielarson." - @RichardRoeper (Chicago Sun-Times)
"Just watched #CaptainMarvel and I have to say, I was thoroughly entertained! Action scenes were awesome, the visuals were stunning, and @brielarson brought so much depth to the role. Plus, Goose the cat stole the show!" - @AshCrossan (Entertainment Tonight)
"Just out of #CaptainMarvel! So much fun! @brielarson crushes it as Carol Danvers, the film has great energy, and the action scenes are top-notch. Also, Goose the cat is purr-fect " - @SeanOConnell (CinemaBlend)
"I went into #CaptainMarvel knowing very little about the character, but I came out feeling like I'd been on a thrilling ride!
